# 2010 Prince Edward Island Scotties Tournament of Hearts

The 2010 Prince Edward Island Scotties Tournament of Hearts was held Jan. 2â€“5 in at the Montague Curling Club in Montague, Prince Edward Island. The winning team represented Prince Edward Island at the 2010 Scotties Tournament of Hearts in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario.
